Projects

Django Elasticemail

This will enable sending emails in django project via elasticemail.com

This will enable sending emails in django project via elasticemail.com

Django Seed

Seed project for Django + MongoDB + Redis + Celery

The seed project with the implementation of REDIS, Celery, MongoEngine, django rest framework to quickly get started

r2 Gromacs GUI

GUI tool for a molecular dynamics tool - Gromacs (www.gromacs.org).

Web based graphical Interface for a molecular dynamics tool gromacs, used prominently in the field of Computational Drug Discovery and Computational Chemistry.

r2 gromacs.py

Automation script for a molecular dynamics tool - Gromacs (www.gromacs.org).

Web based graphical Interface for a molecular dynamics tool gromacs, used prominently in the field of Computational Drug Discovery and Computational Chemistry.

Lucy Chatbot

A chatbot that is designed to become a scientist's personal research assistant

This is a sub project for developing a personal research assistant for RSQUARE LABS (former name for Invaana). The core idea of the Lucy is to learn from the research by individual research users and help the same user or other users based on the collective intelligence aggregated from every user, in the same research activities or concepts.

r2 console

Command line utility for monitoring the users' command-line activity.

Command line utility for tracking/monitoring the command-line activity of a researcher. The monitored data can be used to replicate the project or automate it. This is a sub project of the research assistant project.

Rsquare Molecular Viewer

A library to create bio-molecular viewer widgets for developers

Web based molecular viewer for viewing bio molecules in 3D. This is a library that makes setting up molecular viewer widgets on the webpages much simpler.

Whatsapp chatmate

Chatmate project the reads what for Django + MongoDB

The project reads the exported whatsapp chat from a text file, and the bot will chat to you based on your conversation. This is still an amateur version, way more to be done.
